### Tender Details

This government tender announcement is for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, accessories, services, and supplies. The announcement is specifically reserved for Holders of Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI who are pre-qualified on this arrangement.

Natural Resources Canada, Energy Technology Sector, requires an analyzer to detect, quantify, and report C1-C10 hydrocarbons and benzene/toluene/ethylbenzene/xylene (BTEX) present in dilute concentrations in a gaseous combustion product stream. The analytical system includes a wind tunnel, a sampling system, and an analyzer.

### Request for Proposal

The successful bidder must be able to deliver an analyzer capable of detecting hydrocarbons at sub-ppm levels and up to 100 ppm concentration. The bidder must also demonstrate excellent communication skills, experience, and references in the field of scientific and laboratory equipment.

### Tender Conditions

- Only qualified suppliers with a valid supply arrangement are eligible to bid.
- The procurement method is competitive selective tendering.
- The trade agreements apply: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- Natural Resources Canada is the contracting entity.

### Contact Information

To obtain further information, please contact Kimberly Roy at:

- Email: [kimberly.roy@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca](mailto:kimberly.roy@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca)
- Phone: 902-237-6548

Note: The tender conditions and requirements can be obtained from the government's website. The bidder must be registered with the supplier arrangement number #E60PV-19EQUI to be eligible to participate in this tender.  |}
